name: Pushem
overview: Pushem is a game that requires a lot of creativity and creativity from the players requires forward thinking. The player must, if he wants to solve levels, PUSH red balls onto target squares. At the same time he can just push ONE ball. A level is considered solved when every target field is occupied by a ball. Another nice sliding game from the 'Sokoban'- Genre for many hours of fun.The game came with a built in level editor.
